avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and in gullies and bowls. In particular places where weaknesses exist in the old snowpack are critical. In addition the wind slabs of recent weeks are capable of being triggered still.
Avalanches can be released by large loads. Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.
avalancheActivity.highlights:
Moderate avalanche danger will prevail.
Weak layers in the old snowpack represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment:
Faceted weak layers exist in the snowpack in particular on shady slopes.
The weather conditions will give rise to slight moistening of the snowpack above approximately 2000 m.

tendency.highlights:
In some localities heavy precipitation.
The weather report and anticipated change in the avalanche danger are uncertain. We recommend that you consult the most recent avalanche bulletin.

avalancheActivity.comment: Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found on very steep shady slopes. Individual mostly small avalanches are further not ruled out.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The avalanche prone locations are rather rare.

snowpackStructure.comment: Over a wide area a little snow is lying.

tendency.highlights:
In some localities heavy precipitation.
The weather report and anticipated change in the avalanche danger are uncertain. We recommend that you consult the most recent avalanche bulletin.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular in gullies and bowls and at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. This applies in particular on very steep shady slopes. In addition the wind slabs of recent weeks are capable of being triggered in isolated cases. Avalanches can be released, mostly by large loads.
Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found in steep terrain.

snowpackStructure.comment:
Over a wide area a little snow is lying. The snowpack will be subject to considerable local variations.
Weak layers exist in the snowpack.
The weather conditions will give rise to slight moistening of the snowpack in some cases above approximately 2000 m.

tendency.highlights:
In some localities precipitation.
The weather report and anticipated change in the avalanche danger are uncertain. We recommend that you consult the most recent avalanche bulletin.
